name: SNEK 99
description:
SNEK 99 is the classic game of Snake except turned into a 99-player battle royale. That's it.

Credits:

  • https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1070439 - menu music
  • https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1080630 - gameplay music 1

If anything does not work, let me know. I'm still testing waters on this.
